dataset_id: BOREAS RSS-14 Level-3 Gridded Radiometer and Satellite Surface Radiation Images
title: BOREAS RSS-14 Level-3 Gridded Radiometer and Satellite Surface Radiation Images
summary: The BOREAS RSS-14 team collected and processed GOES-7 and -8 images of the BOREAS region as part of their effort to characterize the incoming, reflected and emitted radiation at regional scales. This data set contains surface radiation parameters, such as net radiation and net solar radiation, that have been interpolated from GOES-7 images and AMS data onto the standard BOREAS mapping grid at a resolution of 5 km N-S and E-W.
